articles.title: Christian Whiton: Trump right to order killing of Iranian Gen. Soleimani – Will make Americans safer
articles.description: President Trump acted correctly and decisively in ordering the Friday morning killing of Iranian General Qassem Soleimani, the head of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps’ elite Quds Force, in an airstrike in Iraq.

articles.title: Travis Scott, Frank Ocean, Rage Against the Machine to headline Coachella
articles.description: The lineup for this year's Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival has been announced.
articles.content:
The lineup for this year's Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival has been announced.
Travis Scott, Frank Ocean and Rage Against the Machine will headline the festival in Indio, Calif., beginning Friday, April 10.
